name: Trick Shot (itch) (Mickehh, DrPumpkins, Lynk)
description:
This was made for the Buddy Up Jam!

This is our first go at a Godot project! :3

"New beginnings are often disguised as painful endings"

Sometimes in a platformer, you just can't reach the platform by jumping.. you might need to throw a part of yourself and hope to grow a new body later!

The game has 7 levels that you can play and try trick shots! some of them can be solved with only one shot! If you manage to pull off any cool trick shots, let us know! 😁

Controls: MoveA, DJump/FallW, SThrow headLeft Mouse ButtonRestartR The team:

Mickehh - game designer, (a little) level design, programmer

Lynk - game designer, level designer, programmer (https://lynksoft.itch.io/)

Drpumpkins - Artist (https://drpumpkins.itch.io/)

Lemmy Rascal - Sound designer, music composer
